# planetscale_database_default_branch (Resource)

DatabaseDefaultBranch Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "planetscale_database_default_branch" "my_databasedefaultbranch" {
  branch       = "...my_branch..."
  database     = "...my_database..."
  organization = "...my_organization..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `database` (String) The name of the database
- `organization` (String) The name of the organization the database belongs to

### Optional

- `branch` (String) The default branch of the database. Default: "main"

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

In Terraform v1.5.0 and later, the [`import` block](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) can be used with the `id` attribute, for example:

```terraform
import {
  to = planetscale_database_default_branch.my_planetscale_database_default_branch
  id = jsonencode({
    database = "..."
    organization = "..."
  })
}
```

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import planetscale_database_default_branch.my_planetscale_database_default_branch '{"database": "...", "organization": "..."}'
```
